text: @RichardDawkins Sorry... not beause anything related to #WHO, #HKGov and #CCP, they are not trustworthy, we just base on our past experience and the professions’ advice to fight for Coronavirus. If we really follow guidelines not to wear face masks at the beginning, what would be the result now?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
